message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a little too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, I can't go as low as $10,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  How about we split the difference between my last offer and your current one - would $11,250 work?
